Probabilistic treatment: 2018 recommendations (CNGOF - SPILF) recommend:

- Uncomplicated IGH: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 10 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 10 days


- Gonococcus: Ceftriaxone (1 g/d, IV, 14 days).

- Chlamydia: Doxycycline (100 mg/12 hours, "per os" or IV, 14 days).

question.title: What is the recommended treatment for uncomplicated gonococcal infections in women?
question.description: A multiple-choice question about the treatment of gonococcal infections

option_a.title: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 10 days
option_a.description: A treatment regimen that includes Metronidazole

option_b.title: Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 10 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 10 days
option_b.description: A treatment regimen that includes Doxycycline and Metronidazole

option_c.title: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 14 days
option_c.description: A treatment regimen that includes Ceftriaxone and Doxycycline

option_d.title: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 14 days
option_d.description: A treatment regimen that includes Ceftriaxone and Doxycycline

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: A letter indicating the correct option
